metadata.dc:author: Rius Llorens, Carme
metadata.dc:description: Chronic pain is a persistent pain which continues to afflict a patient despite treatment of the causes which originated that pain and which interferes in the normal everyday family and working life of that patient, developing at times into his/her only problem and conditioning his/her life and that of his/her family and acquaintances. Chronic pain is a worldwide disorder and it affects 23.4% of the population in Spain.
metadata.dc:title: Aspectos psicológicos del dolor crónico.
[Psychological aspects due to chronic pain].
